attributes.action: To allow Facial Feminisation Surgery for trans women and Mastectomy for transmen to be funded on the NHS nationwide
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many transsexual men and women face prejudice every day, this comes in the form of discrimination in areas of employment, abuse, threats of violence and actual physical assault. One of the main reasons this occurs is the individual not passing that successfully. 

Physical appearance is a major factor in passing in one's acquired gender role; and I beleive FFS for transwomen and Mastectomy for transmen would lead to a better quality of life those given the surgery.

Surgery would be based on clinical need, and only proceeded with once 2 medical reports had been submitted. One from the gender specialist dealing with the patient's gender reassignment treatment, and one from a qualified plastic surgeon.
